table.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; text-align: justify; background-color: rgb(238, 240, 252);

td.strong: REPORT BY ASSISTANT OF FUSIONEXCEL HUNGARIA KLARI SZABO.

tr.td:
FE Hungary held an Event on 15th October 2011 in an exclusive 5-Star Chinese restaurant in Budapest. It was attended by about 100 FusionExcel members and potential customers, including natural therapists, athletes, Spokesmen and people who are interested in the positive and healing power of nature.
VIP Guest of the Event was Eva Vandor, a famous Hungarian actress, who's has been wearing FE's Quantum Pendant for several years!
The first speaker was Mr. Laszlo Simon, an expert, who held a 1 hour presentation about the messages of water. The second speaker was Mr. GyozoSzell, official trainer of FusionExcel Hungary, who held a one hour presentation about FE and Quantum Science products. The presentation was really interesting and informative, people were listening to him with great interest!
The third speaker was a great and sophisticated natural therapist, Dr. B.TarczyZita, who talked about aura photography. After her presentation people could visit her at a separate table, where she made aura photos. She gave detailed analysis of the photos as well. Many people took two photos, one photo without FE Quantum Pendant and one photo with the Quantum Pendant. They all were amazed with the huge differences between the photos! These people were so totally convinced with the power of FE's Quantum Pendant!
Fortunately they were in luck! They could buy their own Quantum Pendant on the spot!
The fourth speaker was Mr. Akos Nagy, who is working now on the appearance of FE Hungaria on Facebook. Facebook is a great channel to reach many people!
The last presentation of the day was held again by Mr. GyozoSzell. He talked about E-Pack and China-Pack. His presentation was informative so guests were listening with great interest again!
After the presentations a series of demonstrations were made involving several guests. Both participants and audience enjoyed the demonstrations and, what's more important, everybody could see the power of FE's Quantum Science products.
After the demonstrations some in the audience shared their testimonials. The most fascinating testimonial was by Csilla Antony, who shared with the audience, how FE's Quantum Pendant helped her recover after a long illness. After she was diagnosed with fibroids, she started wearing FE's Quantum Pendant and drinking from FE's Quantum Flask and after 3-4 weeks she went back to the doctor who found that her fibroids have disappeared!!!
The day ended with lucky draws! The lucky winners went home with FusionExcel's Quantum Science products!
Special thanks to the staff of the 9 Dragon Restaurant, to the great presenters, and of course extra special thanks to FusionExcel International for the support!
